name: G.I. Combat: Episode I - Battle of Normandy
name_original: G.I. Combat: Episode I - Battle of Normandy
description:
G.I. Combat: Episode I - Battle of Normandy is a strategy game developed by Freedom Games. It came out on 01-12-2002. It was published by Strategy First.
You can play G.I. Combat: Episode I - Battle of Normandy on PC.
